events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on the highway resulting in significant front-end damage.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and verifying keywords in the customer statement.
An agent has been assigned to manage this auto accident claim and coordinate next steps with the customer.
Customer received acknowledgment of their auto accident claim and was informed about the process moving forward.
Request sent to customer for police report, photos of vehicle damage, and medical bills for injuries sustained.
Customer has provided all requested documents including the police report, repair estimates, and medical treatment records.
Investigation team began reviewing submitted documents and contacted witnesses to verify accident details.
Investigation concluded confirming customer liability and extent of damages consistent with reported vehicle collision.
A settlement offer for repairs and medical expenses has been proposed and sent to the customer for review.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and agreed to the terms for payment processing.
Claim has been formally approved after acceptance of settlement and verification of all documentation.
Payment for vehicle repair costs and medical bills was successfully processed and disbursed to the customer.
The auto accident claim has been closed following the successful settlement and payment completion.
All claim files and correspondence have been archived securely for future reference and compliance purposes.
